column2: so while I was waiting to be seated in their outdoor bar area
column3: I was recommended an excellent Sake that was served in a wooden box.  They say it gives the Sake some earthy tones.  I'm not sure if that was the case
column4: but I did think that was pretty neat.  They also had a waitress walking around with some type of Tempura Fried Cauliflower that was salty (in a good way) and delicious.  Again
column5: this was setting the stage for a great and memorable meal.
